com.facebook.hiveio.record

Interface HiveReadableRecord

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HiveRecord
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRecord

    public interface HiveReadableRecord
    Hive record representing a row for reading.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object get(int index)
      Get column at given index.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Object get(int index)
        Get column at given index. Regular data columns from the tables should always be placed first, and then partition value columns. If you know the type of the column and it is a primitive you should use one of the calls below as it will likely be more efficient.
        Parameters:
        index - column index
        Returns:
        Object for column

      • getBoolean

        boolean getBoolean(int index)
        Get boolean column at given index
        Parameters:
        index - column index
        Returns:
        boolean at index

      • getLong

        long getLong(int index)
        Get long column at given index
        Parameters:
        index - column index
        Returns:
        long at index

      • getDouble

        double getDouble(int index)
        Get double column at given index
        Parameters:
        index - column index
        Returns:
        double at index

      • getString

        String getString(int index)
        Get String column at given index. Note that partition values are all strings.
        Parameters:
        index - column index
        Returns:
        String at index

      • isNull

        boolean isNull(int index)
        Check if value at column is null
        Parameters:
        index - column index
        Returns:
        true if value at at column is null
